array.name: data_name
array.item: ASUS ROG Strix Z590-E Gaming ATX Motherboard
Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO ATX Motherboard
MSI GeForce RTX 3080 Gaming X Trio
EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G5 80 Plus Gold 850W PSU
Corsair Crystal Series 680X RGB ATX Mid Tower Case
NZXT H510i ATX Mid Tower Case
ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q 27" LED Monitor

array.name: data_description
array.item: ASUS ROG Strix Z590-E Gaming ATX Motherboard: Feature-rich motherboard designed for gaming enthusiasts with ASUS ROG Strix branding.

Lenovo L24i-30 LED Monitor: A high-resolution LED monitor with a sleek design and vibrant display. The Lenovo L24i-30 offers a 23.8-inch Full HD IPS panel, providing stunning visuals and wide viewing angles. With its thin bezels and adjustable stand, its an excellent choice for both work and entertainment.
Intel Core i9-11900K: Powerful Intel processor known for its high clock speeds and gaming performance.
AMD Ryzen 9 5900X: High-performance processor from AMD for multitasking and gaming.
Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO ATX Motherboard: AORUS motherboard with B550 chipset from Gigabyte, suitable for gaming builds.
Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 RAM: Corsair RAM known for its reliability and performance, providing 32GB of memory.
HyperX Fury RGB 64GB DDR4 RAM: High-capacity HyperX RAM with RGB lighting for enhanced aesthetics.
MSI GeForce RTX 3080 Gaming X Trio: High-end graphics card from MSI, the Gaming X Trio variant, offering excellent performance for gaming and content creation.
AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT: AMD graphics card known for its strong performance in gaming and graphics-intensive tasks.
Samsung 980 PRO PCIe® 4.0 NVMe® SSD 1TB: High-speed NVMe SSD from Samsung, offering 1TB of storage capacity with PCIe® 4.0 support for fast data transfer speeds.
HyperX Cloud II Wireless: Wireless gaming headset from HyperX, known for its comfort, audio quality, and durability.
Western Digital Black 1TB NVMe SSD: High-speed NVMe SSD from Western Digital, providing fast storage for the operating system and applications.
EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G5, 80 Plus Gold 850W PSU: EVGA power supply with 850W capacity and 80 Plus Gold efficiency for a stable and efficient power delivery.
Corsair Crystal Series 680X RGB ATX Mid Tower Case: Stylish Corsair case with RGB lighting and ample space for high-performance components.
NZXT H510i ATX Mid Tower Case: Sleek and compact NZXT case with modern design and convenient features.
ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q 27" LED Monitor: ASUS gaming monitor with a high refresh rate and G-SYNC support for smooth gaming visuals.
